did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.unittitle: Newspaper article regarding the ILR School, 1948
did.repository: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Article from the Democrat and Chronicle (Rochester, NY) about John Lillich, a student at the ILR School.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: This collection consists of an article from the Democrat and Chronicle (Rochester, NY) about John Lillich, a student at the ILR School.

controlaccess.head: Names:
controlaccess.corpname: New York State School of Industrial and Labor Relations.
